purpose: Test mode 2 with more flexible springs
code_changed: Added 5 modes for setting spring tension: 0=by regions, as it used to be; 1= A-P regions; 2=P-D Gradient; 3=P-D gradient and A-P regions; 4=A-P regions with independent gradients
